properties.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued January 1 at 3:50PM CST until January 3 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...FLASH FLOODING AND RIVER FLOODING EXPECTED THURSDAY INTO EARLY
FRIDAY...

The National Weather Service in Jackson has expanded the

* Flash Flood Watch to include portions of south central
Mississippi and southeast Mississippi, including the following
areas in south central Mississippi, Jefferson Davis. In
southeast Mississippi, Covington.

* From Thursday morning through Friday morning

* Storm total rainfall amounts of 3 to 5 inches are expected
across the area, with locally higher amounts possible.

* Areas of flash flooding are likely. Some roads may be flooded
or possibly closed. Some structures may be threatened with
inundation. Moderate river flooding is also possible.
properties.instruction:
A Flash Flood Watch means that conditions may develop that lead
to flash flooding. Flash flooding is a very dangerous situation.

You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action
should flash flood warnings be issued.

NWSheadline: FLASH FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING
